name: Outside The Walls: Motherly Love
description: Sometimes, secrets get broken. When they're broken, your life can be turned upside down. What if, you were the one who knew all the secrets, or so you thought. Outside The Wall - Motherly Love; a story following a young man named Amed who was raised by his father, may find that seeking out truth about his village and the whereabouts of his mother can have deadly consequences.
